website_summaries.verdict: Between its ultra-simple design and affordability, Aluratek’s entry model is the easiest way to get a digital photo frame on your wall.
pros: Insert memory card, and frame automatically displays photo slideshow
cons: Must be plugged into the wall to work

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: The one I purchased developed an intermittency in its power supply and cycles power after only getting through two or three pictures in the slide show I set up (about 15 seconds). I assume mine is just broken but I won't be replacing it because: The screen is ionized and so the pictures are only worth looking at from straight on. The controls are not responsive. The screen can't be re-oriented from displaying pictures horizontally, so if you have any vertically-oriented pictures (like the posters I bought it to display) you have to rotate them in a picture editor or else they'll take up only a fraction of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Albright

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the get correct USB type!
customer_reviews.text: Initially when I set this item up I followed the instructions exactly and the product did not end up working. After a week of submitting customer service complaints, I finally got a phone conversation where I found out the product only works with a FAD32 type USB. This was nowhere in the instructions and as this was a mothers day gift was a bit awkward. Onto the product itself, the pictures taken vertically on phones dont scale on screen and are shown small, however, horizontal pictures work excellent. Picture quality is good and its easy to use (once the above mentioned issues are resolved)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap! Purchased May 25th, stopped working July 10th. Just get a white screen, all attempts to reset unsuccessful. Seller will not accept return/exchange. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM! Update: Also DANGEROUS!!! Came to my office this morning and I feel fortunate that the building wasn't on fire. The device shorted out the thumb drive, causing it to melt. You are warned!!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture but crappy design
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but I'm very disappointed in the design. You can not use a long USB flash drive without it showing... okay, I can get around that by buying a short USB drive or using an SD card, but the fracked power plug also sticks out and can be seen from the front... that's unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Christian and Loretta Ninsananda

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new job and my first cubicle. I wanted a digital photo frame so I could be cool like everyone else, but some of them are so expensive! This photo frame is a great price and does exactly what I needed. It's easy to use and the photos look great (you can even adjust the brightness, contrast, etc. in the settings). I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Klemens

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is so overpriced. While I wasnt expecting the image quality to overwhelm me, the rest of the product is just plastic waste. None of the memory cards are working for me, I am forced to use the SD card in conjunction with a USB reader. It doesnt recognize certain photos even though they are all the same image type. It wasnt worth the price, you can find something better that will allow you more flexibility in managing photos.
customer_reviews.author: Medeya

customer_reviews.title: The basic instructions on how to put the pictures on and the modes is pretty simple. The only problem I found is that ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's grandma so she can have pictures of her grandson from when he was little to now since he is graduating high school and about to enter the Army. The basic instructions on how to put the pictures on and the modes is pretty simple. The only problem I found is that there is no way to change a picture around so it is not side ways or upside down. Changing on the memory card doesn't fix it. Other than that it is a nice digital picture frame.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Grilliot

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product .
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. Don't waste your money. The viewing area is about the size of a 4x6 photo. The picture quality is not good. It took forever to get it to read my SD card and start showing pics. The menu button won't work. I finally got it working but after 2 days, it is just stuck on the same picture. Piece of junk. Now all I get is a big question mark on the screen. Questioning why I bought this, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Despite weak instructions, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I use the digital frame to display rare confirmation cards received from amateur radio operators around the world. Despite weak instructions, the unit does what I'd hoped it would. I had to re-scan my cards once I discovered (without help from the instructions) that the only file format supported is JPEG. As another person noted, only horizontal (landscape) photos display correctly. And I found that the menu choices need to be made before inserting the USB drive. Once I got through these initial discoveries, it works as expected and saves me from hanging plastic display sheets on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Lohman

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed this frame for 2
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this frame for 2,5 months but then it started to freeze. It wasn't working continuously because I was shutting it off at night. And there are only 15 images that are looping all day in the flash disc. So, it shouldn't be too tired or worn out. I'd like to return it, but that window is closed already.
customer_reviews.author: Ozpkr

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this photo frame. I bought for my mother who is in an assisted living facility. Due to the Coronavirus I can't go in and visit her. I had given her one of my old photo frames to use but when the staff updated it with a new memory card it would no longer work... too complicated for them to have to go in and change settings. I bought this one because of how simple it was to operate. I gave it to staff, they plugged it in, and it worked immediately. They've updated it with new memory cards with no issues, it again starts with the new pictures immediately. The settings are very easy to use. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Elderly Parents!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly parents. They love it. Once photos are on, you don't have to touch at all. (except to add more photos). I set it to go on in the morning and off at night. It's wall mountable, supports up to an SD 16 gb card, (which is easier to load then the frame itself). Perfect size, Has the calendar, alarm, music, videos. Everything I want and more. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: dolphins0916

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate for my needs and situation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this digital frame to use in my office. I work in a pediatric speech therapy clinic, where things are often taken off my desk by little hands and are mishandled. Kids will be kids and my special needs friends especially like to grab things when one is not looking. I wanted a frame that could show multiple pictures of family, friends, and pets so that I could glance at it when I feel stressed. This was a budget-friendly option that has decent picture quality. In the event that little hands break it, I won't be upset and can replace it without having to spend hundreds of dollars each time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents loved this gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandparents, who don’t really use computers or tablets. They were amazed at the pictures changing and that o could just bring them more on a memory card every few weeks! If you were more tech savvy or want more features this might not be the one for you, but it was a perfect, inexpensive gift.
customer_reviews.author: MorganTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Got this to give to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to specifically give to a friend who moved out of state. I've loaded an SD card with memories and it plays straight from the memory card, without needing any setup. Picture quality is decent, not high resolution but it is doable. It's a little hard to navigate the menu's but if you need to have something up and running fast and easy, then this is a great frame.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Making ALL the pictures show up
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that come with the device, as well as the manufacturer's website support info, are ABSOLUTELY INFURIATING USELESS. The info that they do provide is severely lacking. In the words of Douglas Adams, Aluratek will be the first ones up against the wall when the revolution breaks. The frame can only show the images that come directly from a digital camera, or saved by Microsoft Paint program or other photo editor (I used Photoshop Elements). If you are missing pictures that are loaded to your SD card or USB memory stick, open them with a photo editor and then save them to the card or stick.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of the Line
customer_reviews.text: What a waste! OK - If all of your pictures are a particular orientation, and all your pictures are a particular resolution, you might like this frame. It is not the quality that I expect. Despite how pictures display on any other app, your pictures may show up sideways or even upside-down if this frame can't figure out how to actually display them. Older pics that are only 640x480 do not fill the entire frame. This frame does not show your pictures in any random order - they are just cycled in name order. Some pics that display fine in other apps are sideways or even upside-down in this frame. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Perry

customer_reviews.title: The only problem I found is that there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I found is that there is no way to change a picture around so it is not side ways or upside down. Changing on the memory card doesn't fix it. Please advise. 300 photos of SD card and half view as sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well good picture. 4:3 aspect.
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this does not use leds for illumination as it is an older technology so the life may not be as long as other newer models. For the screen size the resolution is good, sharp and clear. The aspect ratio is 4x3 not 16x9 but it was what I needed for older photos so if you have alot of 16x9 material I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Phil0sophic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Digital Frame
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to work and very nice. All you have to do is plug in your usb drive or SD card and it will automatically play the pictures. The screen stays horizontal but offers options to make the pictures for the screen or just have the pictures as is. Also offers several transitions (close is the simplest) and a timer for pictures. Really great gift for elderly family members or just a mantle decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Present!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift. It was easy to upload photos, but I still need to figure out how to flip the ones that are sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this frame for a senior member of my family. She just loves it!. It is very use to use. I loaded some pictures on a usb. She powered the frame and the show started. In addition other members of the family can provide her with more images of their own adding usb or memory card. Perfect simple gift for someone who does not want to be frustrated with all kinds of buttons and choices which can be very annoying and actually unnecessary. Customer service was also very helpful: prompt response to my questions, courteous and helpful. Would definitely buy it again and recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: nonna77

customer_reviews.title: Great for parents
customer_reviews.text: My parents have always been traditional physical picture people. Trying to convert them to the digital age has been somewhat difficult but this frame is a great first step. Got this one for my mother for her office as she works. Slides through a set of digital images and she loves it. Next step is the old man!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rinz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Clarity!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you'd think your not getting the greatest digital photo frame but that is further from the truth! this is an amazing digital photo frame. The pictures come out clear and it works very well! as long as it last many years this will be a quality product that I will buy for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Pirchased to make a memory gift and it turned out beautifully. Sound quality is great. Picture quality is great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hys_Ladee_Ballard

customer_reviews.title: What a pain! Quality is decent
customer_reviews.text: It is a good price, but the "easy of use" is very misleading. After plugging it in and attempting to add image and video files to the internal memory it didn't matter what file type I converted the video the digital photo frame would come up with "Not Supported File". Going to Aluratek's website has an FAQ section with this information: Playing movies (Internal memory models only) The recommended filetype for playing videos on the frame is the .avi video filetype with the XVID video codec and the MP3 audio codec. The recommended dimensions are 720x576. The recommended framerate is 24fps or less. Here is the link of the site I used to convert my videos to AVI.
customer_reviews.author: Nanners1010

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty much how I wanted it to. Seems like a good, affordable electronic photo frame so far. However, it is just somewhat annoying that the screen isn't normal photo size like 4x6 or 5x7, so all my pictures don't take up the whole screen, there are black bars on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are displayed with critical flaws/glitches/errors
customer_reviews.text: Of the ~125 pictures I properly uploaded (and tried on three different cards), about half of them display fine...but the other half either have sever bars of discoloration (typically either the most common colors in the pic split into about 3-5 vertical or horizontal bars badly distorting the image), and some of those are so bad just half of the picture doesn't show up. Same error happens on the same pics every time they scroll through the slideshow, making this item essentially a waste of your $31.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Handsome Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this frame running for a few weeks and it is doing great. I opted to load medium-resolution photos to a flash drive and the photos run continuously. I had a little challenge getting the time and date set but that was the only issue. The remote is easy to use and accurate. Packaging and delivery above expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kim MacMullan

customer_reviews.title: images wouldn't loop, remote doesnt work, cheap
customer_reviews.text: I uploaded about 50 pictures and when it got to the end it just stopped. I went through all the settings and found no help. The remote wouldn't work consistently even with new batteries. I had to use the buttons on the back of the frame to navigate. It was tedious to navigate and the device felt very cheap. for $100 I expected at least a rotating loop for my photos and a device that worked. I returned it. For a little more money I found one better quality, way more options, better picture, and it worked!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Don't think, just get it!!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect! I was a little worried when I opened the box because it is so light but the picture quality is amazing and the transition between pictures is super cool!!! I bought this as a gift but I am going to order one for myself too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Priced Changing Picture Frame
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Wanted something for my desk at home where I could view many of the great pictures that I have. Perfect size for my desk and picture quality is very good. Reasonably priced, having seen similar products much more expensive. This was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Howard M. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great way to view your pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame and the ability to view my photographs from a thumb drive or chip. Great picture quality and screen quality. I love to sit back and watch my photos bring back great memories! Great price for this too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Husemann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size frame for table
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase of this photo frame. I’m using it to commemorate our boxer dog’s memory. I would definitely recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this purchase as it is doing exactly what I had hoped. The screen is just the right size for a table top location and my pictures keep reminding me of al the wonderful places that I have seen so far. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Diefendorf

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item as a gift and downloaded a lot of pictures before giving it to them. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: I see my family...
customer_reviews.text: I have one, and we purchased another one for one of our "child" living in another country far away from us. High quality of the screen (it depends also from the original pics), very light, except a not good design of the "foot", very unstable. If the company may consider my comment and make a better design, it will be really a 5* product, which I still highly recommend it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ilko G. Iliev

customer_reviews.title: The gift of memories
customer_reviews.text: I have a handicapped sister, now in her late 70s, and every year I struggle with what to give her. During a visit with her during the past year, I pulled out my laptop and we scrolled through photos of our family. She really lit up seeing our parents (both long deceased), herself in years gone by, and nieces, nephews, and other loved-ones. So it dawned on me I could give her a digital photo frame loaded with the photos. I'm eager to see how she responds, but I think I found a perfect gift. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Pond

customer_reviews.title: Your memories on repeat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift so my father in law can see pictures of family past and present without getting out multiple heavy photo albums. I do wish it had included a thumb drive. I had to go get one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Great frame when it does work. Ours is glitchy. Defective frame?
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: It was loved so much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these we purchased. This is the exact same make and model as previously purchased as a gift. It was loved so much, that a long-distance relative was so grateful to have multiple frames with different pictures on each (she's not tech-savvy, so can't upload photos herself, and with the distance, we are unable to add pictures to the previously purchased item). Even if all photos were uploaded to the first frame, it's nice for her to have two separate frames with unique photos on each.
customer_reviews.author: RAD Resort

customer_reviews.title: Landscape oriented pics l
customer_reviews.text: Pictures present landscape or letter (however they were taken) and are great quality with lower brightness settings. A mini usb fits flush. There is no optional wall mount slot on the back. Slideshow times are 3, 5, 15, 30, 60 seconds.....up to one hour? The screen is really sensitive to finger grease and needs tv cleaner to safely resolve. Perfect for home or work.
customer_reviews.author: eatmyshorts

customer_reviews.title: Always freezes after like 50 pictures
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. No matter how many times I mess with this, turn it off and on, anything at all, it always gets stuck after a certain amount of time. It won't sit and rotate your pictures forever. There's some bug in the system that causes it to freeze, and there's nothing that can be done about it. Trash product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaito

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandma. The screen is large enough for her not to need her glasses to see what's on the screen and still stay seated on the couch. The device set up is intuitive (just plug in the power cord and insert the flash drive) and very easy to use. I'd recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Save money on prints, save storage at home!
customer_reviews.text: I had thousands of photos in my computer that I have taken in over a decade! I finally swept my computer, deleted old pictures I didn't like and put them all in my SD card. This picture frame is a GREAT deal for someone who wants a simple and nice quality set up. Plug in and start! Nothing complex. A+ for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice digital frame
customer_reviews.text: It has good brightness, and clarity and works from many different sources for your pictures. It could use an internal memory and the ability to display pictures in as close to full size as possible rather than in their original sizes but overall, a very good item for those who don't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use for a slideshow
customer_reviews.text: I chose this model because it claimed it was easy to use. As this will be a gift for my elderly grandmother I needed this to be as simple as possible. It truly is. I uploaded a bunch of pictures on a usb drive and plugged it into the unit before I powered it on the first time. Plugged it in and it powered on by itself and started a slideshow of my pictures! It feels durable and the quality is perfect for the price! This is my honest review. If you need an easy to use unit this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Used my quarantine time to organize photos and decide to purchase this unit for a gift and will be sending to my Mom for Mother’s Day. Easy set up, upload photos and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shoponlinemom

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up 👍, beautiful picture quality🌠 instructions cover it ALL👏👏
customer_reviews.text: I love how quickly and painlessly I was able to set it up, the picture display is awesome, I cried at seeing my grandma and truly needed that. Good quality, awesome price and looks classy too! The instructions are clear and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Connors

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality and no picture distortion.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously gotten another one and had to return it because it distorted and pictures. This one gives me perfect pictures with true color. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: My digital picture frame of 10 years died right before Christmas. My husband bought me the Alura-tek as a Christmas gift. It was so easy to set-up. The brightness was a little too high but with the remote I was able to reduce the brightness and the pictures are awesome. I love the versatility of being able to add music, play videos as well as digital pictures. The remote feature is a great bonus. I love this digital picture frame and highly recommend it to all consumers. Thank you Alura-tek for a great digital picture frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Does not support most promised to play Video formats like MP4 or MPEG which other popular players support!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product and a large size frame but I bought two and returned one because it does not play the promised video formats. Most MP4 or MPEG video formats which play in most other players like Windows Media Players, VLC, Realplayer, and Movies and TV Windows Store App, and SAMSUNG TV Media Player do not play well and either result in Screen Lock-Ups or Unsupporte File Format Errors. Pay more for smaller but other high quality frame with high quality video playing software like EMOKILI!!!
customer_reviews.author: CD music collector

customer_reviews.title: Jams on one picture
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Frame continues to stop on one photo. Even when I restart most times it does not fix the problem. Called their phone number and spoke to Brian who told me that even though the frame worked fine for three months after a while pictures taken from my Nikon camera, iPhone 10, iPhone 8 and Samsung cell phone are "too big"! He used an analogy that if you load two tons in a one ton truck it will fail, so he told me to go into each photo and "downsize". Don't have to do that with other frames, so very disappointed with product and support!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even if you read the fine print, it's up to sender to read too.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to support all video or picture formats when I attempted to use a USB from another frame I own and works it gave me error messages for some stuff. It played some videos, but no pictures showed up and they are regular Jpegs. However, the problem isnt really the product it's the fact that Amazon sold me a 4GB and sent me a product that's 512MB that's a big difference. So I'm assuming this really isn't and up-to-date model.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product for nothing too serious. Don't expect to customize or edit pictures from the screen. It does what is expected, displays photos. There are settings for brightmess, backlight. A preview of the transitions would be helpful but with a little figuring it's easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Fine for an elderly person
customer_reviews.text: This is a low cost item I bought for my mom in a nursing home. She has dementia and broke her last one. The picture quality is good enough for her, she loves it! For me, I would want something with a better screen but this is fine for her. She has already dropped it and it did not break! It is a great item for someone like her. Reasonably priced and worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for viewing your favorite photos.
customer_reviews.text: This digital photo frame was a gift to my boyfriend. He's always wanted one and enjoys it very much. He enjoys showing off his pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Miss America

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for my mom who has no tech skills at all! She was able to use it once I walked her thru it! It is nice for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a continuous loop feature.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the picture was great and easy setup. However, I wanted a continuous loop feature along with the slideshow option. I returned the first one thinking maybe it was broken. Got yhe 2nd one less than 48hrs later with the same results. So back it goes and I will look more closely at the features in the future and not assume all electronic picture frames have the continuous loop feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jelbrown67

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The product was so easy to use! Everything was in place and the product was very easy to set up. I bought it for my husband’s birthday. He has it in his office and it works wonderfully! He will enjoy it for a long time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Omnimon

customer_reviews.title: Easy Easy Easy
customer_reviews.text: "Easy to use" is easy to say. The device was very easy to setup and use. Now I have my pictures all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother, she absolutely loves it! It was easy to set up, and loading pictures to a sd card for display was simple.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE DIGITAL FRAME
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, well packaged and exactly the product advertised. Worked perfectly right out of the box with a 16GB flash drive loaded with 20,000 photos. It was a Mother's Day hit. I selected this as a replacement to a much older and smaller frame that finally gave out. My wife even thought this was too big, until she turned it on and was impressed she could see the photos from across the room. So far quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Slideshow Freezes
customer_reviews.text: It was working well then it just stopped doing the slide show loop function. Unplugging it does not fix it, the on off button stopped working as well.
customer_reviews.author: CMX

customer_reviews.title: disappointing gift, poor image
customer_reviews.text: Image quality isn't anything to write home about. I think for the money you could find something for the same price with a better image. Gave as gift and was disappointed when they viewed images they were pixelated , stopped to load all the time, color was off. I do photography and own other digital frames -this was intended as a 'secondary desk gift' so there wasn't a lot of money spent on it. Yet again, my own 11x14 frame didn't cost much more than this and has great image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR OUR MOTHER'S MEMORIAL SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Your digital picture frame worked perfect for our mother's memorial. It was easy to set up. It allowed us to show more pictures of her life. We simply plugged in a USB stick and we were done. We had no problem with sideway pictures or auto rotation. Thank you for your fine product. It made the services special.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Wendy

customer_reviews.title: it is a pretty good digital frame for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, but not very user friendly to set up and I don't think it is very high quality. The first one I got was broken and it took me forever to get in touch with support or to look up issues online. Finally they sent me a new charger and it worked, but it was a huge pain! Also, a lot of the photos from my iPhone import upside down so I had to manually adjust a lot of them. It's a pain, but once you get it set up and working, it is a pretty good digital frame for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kjs81

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself is the size I was looking for. I got this as a gift for my husband to put on his work desk and he was happy with it. Personally I was disappointed that the pictures didn't fill the entire screen (it almost does) and vertical pictures show up smaller than I'd like. A memory card or USB must be kept in the frame so in order to change/add pictures we need to remember to bring home the SD card or USB. It serves its purpose well enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana MS

customer_reviews.title: Buy the 8inch ones and from a seller without a quantity restriction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the 8 inch versions because the seller restricted the purchase quantities and I happen to have a big family. If it wasn't so close to as I would return these and buy the 8 inch versions the quality is so different I actually feel bad for the family members stuck with these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for an older relative to be able to see all the children and grandchildren any time. It was not difficult at all to set it up for her (I am not the most tech savvy) and all she has to do is plug it in and the slideshow of pictures starts right up. This would be a wonderful gift for a relative who lives far away to make them feel closer at the holidays or for someone in a nursing home.
customer_reviews.author: artista

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last!!
customer_reviews.text: The last digital frame by the same brand lasted years, this one a few months. Dec 2019 to the end of Mar 2020. I was hoping it would turn back on after taking out usb stick and then unplugging-still no go. The frame ran day and night but the last one did as well. Guess I shouldn’t buy another frame from them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Not super fancy just a basic frame. Very clear pictures, easy to use. I'm very impressed with how it is holding up seeing as my toddler keeps grabbing it, unplugging it often, and will pull it off onto the hardwood floors and it has cracked, scratched or broken yet. If you want a digital frame but your afraid your kids will break it this one seems to be pretty kid proof so far. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Seachick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to get the photos to look as great as they did as non-digital, but I like having my 500+ photos on display randomly. I probably would spend more in the future for a higher end frame, but this is nice enough considering how much cheaper it was than other frames.
customer_reviews.author: catgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Good picture
customer_reviews.text: This item was for my boss and he loves it. We took pictures of the workers holding a sign saying happy birthday. It was priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with this item. Will not play photos. Loaded pics onto both a USB drive and an SDHC card. Neither would play on the frame. Went to the Aluratek website to find out what could be wrong. Says that if the photo size is too large, then it won't play. They suggest using Photoshop to make the pictures smaller. I have neither the time nor the desire to reformat over 100 pictures. This frame is getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Does not shuffle pictures!
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent frame with one glaring flaw in my opinion. The picture quality is good, the remote works well, and the interface is intuitive. I had it set up and running in no time. The bad part is that the slideshow feature does not do random pictures! This is a photo frame, not a projector for a business presentation. People want to see random photos of their family show up, but this frame goes through same order each time it turns on. There are no options in the software to change this. If you're okay with the same sequenced pictures over and over, then this frame is fine. If you're wanting random pictures, buy a different frame.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: 8 inch screen. hi-res. pictures are clear and good! great quality digital picture frame at this price. Plug and play is convenient to use. Minus 2 stars for company giving me a gift card in exchange for review. Beware of 5 star reviews for this product. Most reviewer won't admit this I assume.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our granddaughter visiting from Oaxaca, Mexico and loaded with all the photos of her time with us. Photo quality seemed a bit bright at first viewing but was fixed by going through settings. General settings was tricky at first to access but once I figured it out it was very simple. Portrait oriented photos seem small but landscape ones filled the screen. Most importantly our granddaughter loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Frame
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter bought this for her boyfriend for his birthday. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The screen won't stay on
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the video that my son made for my birthday, however, the video won't stay on long, it will go off as well as the whole photo frame. I like it because it has a calendar video too, but it don't always stay on as needed to refer back too. Plus it's stays plugged up so why doesn't it goes off. You have to be up close to use the remote
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond frustrated with this product. I ordered one and after setting it up, per the instructions, the photos would display in order. However, after the last picture on the USB flash drive displayed, the frame would freeze. The only way to get it to start the slide show over was to unplug it and plug it back in. I tried to call customer service, but was just on hold. Fortunately, I was able to return it to Amazon and order a replacement frame. I set the second frame up and had the same issue. I will be sending this one back and going with a different brand of frame.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Comparing it to the very expensive frames this would do just fine. Great quality and size. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves hers! It is a little difficult to figure out the pictures and getting them uploaded. Some are not the correct way
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Good for a sweet Christmas present for family or friends!! But picture adjustments size are required
customer_reviews.text: We had a professional Christmas photo-shoot just for this picture frame display! The pictures look perfect on the display but the sizing needs to be correct or you'll get black borders on your picture. One picture where the photographer took a vertical picture of my friends and I, it showed a 2 inch black border from left to right and vice versa! If you adjust a picture like that then say hello Jenny Craig, cause you're going to look morphed and unflattering. Anyways we just kept all horizontal pictures, adjusted the size, and abra-kadabra! We have a perfect gift for family and friends!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: worth the money, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: i got this when my dog passed away, and i used the usb. it also has a spot for an sd card, but i'm not sure how much that would hold. i uploaded thousands of pictures of my dog and still have more room, this was a great buy. all you do is plug it in, plug in the usb and it starts. you can mess around with the settings, from 5 seconds on each picture to 15 minutes i think. you can also choose how the slide show transitions each photo, and how it fits the screen. i love this picture frame!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mother in law and it works wonderfully. The only issue I had was it does not come with a cord or anything to attached to your computer. So unless you have a spare sd card and a computer or printer that has an sd port you are out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: RKHoman

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this digital photo frame today 8”. Easy to put together and pics nice. So far so good They said to fill out a review and they would send a free gift a 2600 mAh power bank. That’s great could use one too send too Elaine Gross 9676 Pavarotti Terrace #101 Boynton Beach,Fl 33437 Thanks lannie15@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Elaine gross

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my coworkers. As a teacher, I had the idea of having it up in my classroom to constantly display and scroll through things my students needed reminding of, like sight words and math facts. It works well and keeps them engaged. The picture quality is great and there's no problem with it staying on the entire time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: titus mark

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 82 year old Grandpa who loved this! He's very tech savvy I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 82 year old Grandpa who loved this! He's very tech savvy I have to say. He knows how to text and Facebook so he was able to figure out how to transfer his pictures from his computer into this frame. I feel like these frames have been around for a while and are a little underrated. I think they're underrated because we all have pictures of our phones to look at, but for people who don't have smart phones or tablets, this would be a perfect gift for them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Refuses to show all of the pictures I uploaded
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my best friend who was going out of town away from her family and friends to be able to see them whenever she wanted. I cannot get this electronic photo frame to show all of the pictures though. I have tried so many times to put about fifty pictures on this thing and it will only show four. I’ll connect my usb to a computer and all fifty will pop up on the drive but not on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Macaluso

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first after reading some of the reviews. I had some issues at first getting it to accept my SD card, after a few attempts we got it, some pictures weren't read but it was a gift so my aunt may not ever know. she loved it would defiantly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Noel

customer_reviews.title: They loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these are gifts for my Mother in law & my dad for his office. Went to Target and bought 2 SD cards for $9.99 each and uploaded a ton of pictures on them for each one. So easy to do and love the slideshow. They were both very happy with their gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan M

customer_reviews.title: Gift, that can't be used
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift... but kept it in the box on a shelf for awhile. There occasion I purchased it for was postponed. I opened it to upload pictures and the screen is broke. It's useless. Also the box says 512 MB, but there's a sticker over it saying 4GB. So which is it?
customer_reviews.author: Mistos

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work/support and file formatting?
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty tech-savvy and I've tried both an SD card and zip drive. The frame won't play/support any of my files... I've even re-saved them in multiple different formats and it still doesn't work. It also seems VERY cheap when trying to hit the button back to the main menu... it hardly works. Piece of junk. My return window is closed too because it took a while to try multiple different methods. Bought this to commemorate a relative that's recently passed. Such a waste of money and disappointment. Spend a couple extra bucks and get a nicer one so you don't get screwed like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. I was looking for a digital frame for pictures of a pet that passed away. No need for wifi connection or over the air updating. The frame fir the job perfect and ant a great price.
customer_reviews.author: FGood

customer_reviews.title: Parents loved them as gifts
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought both of our parents one of these frames and loaded jump drives with photos of us, our son, and a few random pictures of pizza. They loved them. Just waiting for them to happen to be looking when the real weird photos pop up...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vargason

customer_reviews.title: Get a different one!
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly at all. When you plug in the usb, it should automatically allow for the pictures to show up... but instead you have to keep pushing a series of buttons (menu, back, photos, menu) until it just toggles to work. Definitely not worth the money - it’s functional but you could find better quality for better price, im sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: first one DOA - second one works great
customer_reviews.text: first one DOA - second one works great Amazon was fast sending out a replacement Works great Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality is Excellent (3MB each picture)
customer_reviews.text: The frame is a good size and easy to navigate. However, not all of my pictures would display properly. The pictures off my camera that were 3MB each displayed great and looked awesome. But any pictures in the KB rage (downloaded off FB) displayed all pixelated and gross. I could only use pictures off my camera. No worries. Now that I know what kind of pictures I can display in the frame it will be easy to display what I intended! (Oh, another thing.... the frame has to be plugged into the wall constantly to work. It does not take batteries and is not chargeable, and it does not hang on the wall.)
customer_reviews.author: Zleah V

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother in Law who has dementia. Looking at the pictures put a smile on her face. So I'm very happy with this product. It was easy to set up & use. So far i have over 500 photos on it - so she will have hours of photos to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Aluratek 7 Inch LCD Digital Photo Frame with Auto Slideshow Using USB & SD/SDHC (ADPF07SF) – Black
product_meta.description:
Aluratek's 7 inch Digital Photo Frame is a wonderful way to bring your treasured memories to life with incredible image clarity in rich and vibrant colors on the true color LCD panel at 1024 x 600 resolution at an ideal 16 9 aspect ratio The functional and compact frame makes a great addition to any room of your house or office Aluratek digital photo frames make a great gift for grandparents moms and just about anyone who would like to share in your families most memorable moments Display photos from your most recent vacation graduations anniversaries and birthdays and relive them over and over again

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Featuring an easy-to-use interface and the simplicity of automatic playback. 
Recognizing a wide variety of digital photo formats automatically. 
What separates Aluratek digital photo frames from other brands is picture quality, ease of use, and affordability. You cannot get a better quality image or video than what Aluratek frames deliver, thanks to the best quality "true digital" LCD panels that are available on the market for production. Combined with an easy-to-use interface, wide format support, and the simplicity of automatic playback, Aluratek digital photo frames are the best choice for storage and playback of your important memories.

View hi-resolution pictures, listen to music and watch videos easily on the TFT true color LCD panels at amazing resolutions. Most Aluratek frames come with built-in flash memory ranging from 256MB to 2GB. Transfer files quickly and easily to the on board memory with USB 2.0, or easily insert a compatible memory card directly to the memory card slot on the frame. With Aluratek's digital photo frames, you can share all your digital pictures, videos, and music files with family, friends, and coworkers.

TRUE DIGITAL LCD PANELS FOR CLEARER PICTURES
What does it mean to use a true digital LCD panel in an Aluratek digital frame? It means that all of your pictures or videos will be noticeably clearer and much crisper than others that have decided to use analog panels as cost-cutting measures. The advantage of utilizing digital panels over analog panels is very similar to the difference in watching HDTV (High Definition Television) instead of standard definition TV. It makes a big difference to watch in crisp clear HD as all the vibrant colors and intricate details will be noticeably better.

ENJOY AUTOMATIC SLIDESHOWS
The best choice for storage and playback of your important memories. 
Aluratek frames will automatically start in slideshow once they are powered on. If you have any music files loaded onto the frame or loaded onto your SD card, they will also begin to play during your slideshow viewing.

Aluratek photo frames recognize a wide number of photo, audio, and video formats automatically, and you can add photos via USB, memory card, or thumb drive. Playback is as simple as turning the frame on.

ULTIMATE USER FRIENDLINESS
In addition to high build quality, Aluratek has also answered the call when it comes to affordability and ease of use. With the non-technical consumer in mind, Aluratek has designed and developed the User Interface software to be as user friendly as possible. Even if you're giving a digital photo frame as a gift item, you can rest assured that anyone can comfortably use an Aluratek digital photo frame.

WHICH ALURATEK DIGITAL PHOTO FRAME IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

View hi-quality digital photos on the 7 InchTFT true color LCD at 800x600 resolution (4:3 aspect ratio). High quality wood frame with easy to use controls; Frame adjustable for vertical orientation
Photo slideshow mode will begin automatically once the frame is powered on
Configure photo slideshows to play in various display and transition modes
Supports various picture formats as most file formats are automatically recognized; Supports SD / SDHC memory cards (up to 32 GB)
Connectivity: USB 2.0, SD/SDHC Card & Resolution: 800 x 600 (4:3 aspect ratio)
Connect a USB flash drive or SD card to easily access and share your favorite photos
